title: Large-Scale Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Virtual Multimedia Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital learning tool proficiency and intermediate-level science domain knowledge
context.additional_context: Science education courses for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify attention-distracting factors (e.g., pop-up notifications) in virtual environments and apply management strategies
Learners can explain design principles (e.g., text/audio integration) for reducing cognitive load when presenting complex multimedia materials
Learners can interpret attention allocation data and information retention rate analysis results measured in experimental settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
